name: periodic-table-app
description: A periodic table app built with Vue 3, typescript and Vite.

scripts.dev:e2e: echo '🔧 Starting dev server for e2e tests...' && vite --port 3001
scripts.wait-server: echo '⏳ Waiting for server to start...' && wait-on http://localhost:3001
scripts.test:e2e:concurrently: echo '🔬 Running tests...' && concurrently --kill-others "start-server-and-test start-server http://localhost:3001 test:e2e"
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Running type-check and building...' && run-p type-check "build-only {@}" --
scripts.preview: echo '👀 Starting preview server...' && vite preview --port 3001 --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.test: echo '🚀 Running tests...' && jest && echo '✅ Tests completed.'
scripts.test:e2e: echo '🌐 Running E2E tests...' && TEST_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3001 npx playwright test --config=playwright-tests/playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:ci: start-server-and-test 'npm run dev:e2e' http://localhost:3001 'npm run test:e2e' --wait-on-timeout 60000
scripts.test:e2e:watch: echo '👀 Watching E2E tests...' && npx playwright test --watch
scripts.test:e2e:debug: echo '🐛 Debugging E2E tests...' && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:e2e:coverage: echo '📊 Generating E2E test coverage...' && npx playwright test --collect=coverage
scripts.test:e2e:report: echo '📝 Showing E2E test report...' && npx playwright show-coverage
scripts.test-and-report: echo '🚀 Running E2E tests...' && npm run test:e2e && echo '🔨 Compiling TypeScript...' && npx tsc playwright-tests/extractFailedTests.ts && echo '🔄 Renaming to .cjs...' && mv playwright-tests/extractFailedTests.js playwright-tests/extractFailedTests.cjs && echo '📄 Running extractFailedTests.cjs...' && node playwright-tests/extractFailedTests.cjs
scripts.audit: echo '🔍 Running Lighthouse audit...' && lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --view
scripts.build-only: echo '🔨 Building project...' && vite build && echo '✅ Build completed.'
scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Linting files...' && eslint . --ext .vue,.js,.jsx,.cjs,.mjs,.ts,.tsx,.cts,.mts --fix && echo '✅ Linting completed.'
scripts.format: echo '🎨 Formatting code...' && prettier --write src/ && echo '🎨 your code is beautifully formatted.🎨 '
scripts.vite:start: echo '🚀 Starting Vite server...' && vite && echo '🛫 Vite server started go to http://localhost:3001/Periodic-Table-App'
scripts.vite:build: echo '🔨 Building with Vite...' && vite build && echo '⚙️ Build completed.🔧'
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json

author: Jagoda11
